May_27.title: Maryland Flood Event: A flood occurs throughout the Patapsco Valley causing one death and destroying the entire first floors of buildings on Main Street in Ellicott City and causing cars to overturn.
2017 â€“ Andrew Scheer takes over after Rona Ambrose as the leader of the Conservative Party of Canada.
Barack Obama is the first president of United States to visit Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park and meet Hibakusha.

May_28.title: Malta votes on the introduction of divorce; the proposal was approved by 53% of voters, resulting in a law allowing divorce under certain conditions being enacted later in the year.
In West Bengal, India, the Jnaneswari Express train derailment and subsequent collision kills 148 passengers.
The first meeting of the Constituent Assembly of Nepal formally declares Nepal a republic, ending the 240-year reign of the Shah dynasty.

May_29.title: One World Observatory at One World Trade Center opens.
A 5.8-magnitude earthquake hits northern Italy near Bologna, killing at least 24 people.
doublet earthquake, of combined magnitude 6.1, strikes Iceland near the town of Selfoss, injuring 30 people.
